name: Wooduko
description:
[How to play]
It's simple to play and relax brain to you stay home, stay safe.
Fit the blocks with x quadra to the board and complete lines or squares to get them removed. When you can't fit the board in list queues, the game over. It's the more time, the high IQ.

[Feature]
* Board 9x9
* Extentions blocks and very nice
* blocks can't rotated
* No time limits
* Free download
* Funny sound effects
* Hours of fun, exciting play
